description.full: Discover your inner artist and unleash your imagination with this easy-to-use and easy-to-learn art creation experience available only on the uDraw GameTablet™! Join Remmy, the game’s new 3D animated host, on a journey spanning 15 unique art lessons and interactive tutorials on a variety of painting techniques. Be inspired with Art Play, a freestyle mode with a variety of paints, brushes, and animated stamps, then use the GameTablet’s™ hand gesture controls to zoom in on your masterpiece! Continue the drawing fun in Art Camp with activities like dot drawing, coloring book pages, and many more!
